text: Drassinella is a genus of North American araneomorph spiders in the family Phrurolithidae, first described by Nathan Banks in 1904. ==Species== it contains seven species: *Drassinella gertschi Platnick & Ubick, 1989 – USA, Mexico *Drassinella modesta Banks, 1904 (type) – USA *Drassinella schulzefenai (Chamberlin & Ivie, 1936) – Mexico *Drassinella sclerata (Chamberlin & Ivie, 1935) – USA *Drassinella siskiyou Platnick & Ubick, 1989 – USA *Drassinella sonoma Platnick & Ubick, 1989 – USA *Drassinella unicolor (Chamberlin & Ivie, 1935) – USA ==References== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Araneomorphae stubs Category:Phrurolithidae Category:Taxa named by Nathan Banks
title: Drassinella
